DDescription.description: This pipelet is used to save the provided properties to the file system using the given path. When a cartridge name is given the file will be stored relative to the according cartridge directory. Otherwise it will be stored relative to the shared directory. The error connector will be used when either the provided cartridge name or the provided path is invalid.
The path controlling where the property file will be stored.
An optional cartridge name. When provided the file will be stored relative to the according cartridge directory.
